Wieden&Kennedy
David & Goliath
PPW
Kessels Kramer

bio.html:
Half German, half Persian, spoke English at home, always wanted to work around the world. Wrote shows for MTV when it was still Music Television. Started out in advertising in the city of Berlin. Went to join Wieden + Kennedy in Amsterdam to work on the global Nike account. 

Returned to Berlin to open the first continental shop for the London-based agency VCCP. Continued to work for Nike, won BMW Motorrad global, O2, Sky, Heineken, Converse and many others. Gained some recognition for our work. TEST.
